page.title: 06Employment in Belsay
page.content: Most of the people living in this block work directly on the farm where they live, either as the farmer, farmworker or supporting housewife with or without farming duties. Of the rest 7 are in business outside the area of this block, 2 assist at the local school on domestic duties, 1 man works as a self employed plumber and 1 man has an agricultural contracting business based within the area. The area does not provide employment for anyone living outside the block apart from the Country Park Warden who travels 20 miles to work.
